title: FPS drops
body: Hello, my fps dropped when i updated my all drivers. I had 180, in teamfights 150, now i have 80 in lane, 40 in teamfights. PC specs: Asus 750 ti strix, i3-2100 cpu, 8GB ram. Whats the problem?

replies.body: and now it takes longer to join chat room.
When i change video settings fps doesnt go up.

FPS issues can sometimes occur due to driver or hardware issues, or game files failing to render the game properly.  We have an [FPS guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) that can help pinpoint the issue and tune-up your rig.  Let me know if you have any issues after!
